core

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Resource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bot, EndingsDatabase, OpeningsDatabase

    public abstract class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
    The model for all resources (databases and bots).
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon, Clement Gautrais, Benoit Travers

    • Constructor Detail

      • Resource

        public Resource(java.lang.String uri,
        java.lang.String name,
        int trust,
        boolean active,
        int id)
        Constructor Add a slash at the end of the URI if there isn't already one.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the resource.
        name - The name of the resource.
        trust - The trust in the resource.
        active - True if the resource is active.
        id - The resource id.

    • Method Detail

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Returns:
        True if the resource was changed.

      • clearSuggestions

        protected abstract void clearSuggestions()
        Clear the suggestions of moves.

      • query

        public void query(java.lang.String fen)
        Query the resource on the network and update the suggestions of move. The resource need to send moves in a JSON document. To be send to the resource, the slashes in the FEN are replaced by dollars. Indead, slashes are a special character for URL.
        Parameters:
        fen - The FEN representing the current position of the chessboard.

      • parseJSONMove

        protected abstract void parseJSONMove(java.lang.String response,
                 java.lang.String fen)
        Parse the JSON moves to openings move. Convert the LAN to SAN if it's necessary.
        Parameters:
        response - The JSON moves.
        fen - The FEN.

        Returns:
        The URI.

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name.

      • isSAN

        public boolean isSAN()
        Returns:
        True if the resource send SAN moves.
